name: Catholic Charities Archdiocese of Hartford

description: Catholic Charities provides a wide array of social services, including behavioral health counseling for adults, children, and families. name: Franciscan Home Care and Hospice Care
description: This is a faith-based, licensed home health care agency that offers nursing care, hospice care, and physical, speech, and occupational therapy. They emphasize the dignity of the human person and the sacredness of human life

name: High Quality Home Therapy
address: Services offered in Stamford, CT, and Rye, NY, with home-based therapy available throughout Connecticut and New York
description: Provides outpatient and home-based occupational therapy services for clients of all ages and diagnoses. They focus on improving the ability to complete everyday activities and offer specialized care for various conditions

name: INSPIRE (Occupational Therapy At Home)
address: Serves adults and seniors throughout Connecticut, with services delivered to patients' residences
description: Offers specialized occupational therapy services at home in Connecticut, focusing on rehabilitation, daily living skills, mobility training, and adaptive equipment recommendations. They serve adults throughout Connecticut and Rhode Island

name: The Church of the Holy Trinity (Occupational Therapy Center)
address: Middletown, CT (specific address not detailed in search results, but associated with St. Vincent de Paul Middletown)
description: This center is a partnership involving Quinnipiac University's Occupational Therapy students and St. Vincent de Paul Middletown.
